creditline: Gift of Donna and Cargill MacMillan Jr.
description: dark orange panel embroidered with black linear cross stitching and embellished with coins; strands of silver chains at two corners--three at each corner terminating with a diamond-shaped silver pendant, two attached to metal hoop, which is also attached to loops of braided green and orange yarn; yarn loops attached to strip of black fabric with maroon cross stitched squares; coins and long tassels of large brown and red beads attached to black strip
dimension: 28 3/8 x 13 in. (72.07 x 33.02 cm) (including yarn loops and ornaments)
medium: Cotton, synthetic fibers (?), coins, wool, metal, beads
title: Head covering (?)
